background: A company is deciding where to promote their product with options including z-tube, soorchle engine, and wassa advertisements.

parameters.definition: Cost of an advertisement on z-tube
Number of viewers attracted by an advertisement on z-tube
Cost of an advertisement on soorchle
Number of viewers attracted by an advertisement on soorchle
Cost of an advertisement on wassa
Number of viewers attracted by an advertisement on wassa
Maximum number of advertisements allowed on soorchle
Maximum proportion of the total number of advertisements that should occur on wassa
Minimum proportion of the total number of advertisements that should occur on z-tube

constraints.description: Number of z-tube ads must be an integer value
constraints.code: # The variable NumZtubeAds is already defined as an integer, no additional constraint is needed.

constraints.description: The number of soorchle ads must be an integer
constraints.code: # No code needed since the variable NumSoorchleAds is already defined as an integer in the given code snippet.

constraints.description: The number of wassa advertisements must be an integer value.
constraints.code: # Since NumWassaAds has already been defined as an integer variable, no additional constraint is required for integrality.

constraints.description: The number of advertisements placed on z-tube must be non-negative
constraints.code:
# The number of advertisements placed on z-tube must be non-negative
model.addConstr(NumZtubeAds >= 0, name="num_ztube_ads_non_negative")

constraints.description: The number of advertisements placed on soorchle must be non-negative
constraints.code: # No code needed since the variable NumSoorchleAds is already guaranteed to be non-negative due to it being an integer variable in Gurobi.

constraints.description: The number of advertisements placed on wassa should be non-negative
constraints.code:
# Add non-negativity constraint for the number of advertisements on wassa
model.addConstr(NumWassaAds >= 0, name="non_negativity_wassa_ads")

constraints.description: Total spending on z-tube ads does not exceed Budget
constraints.code:
# Total spending on z-tube ads does not exceed Budget
model.addConstr(NumZtubeAds * CostZtube <= Budget, name="budget_constraint")

constraints.description: Total spending on soorchle ads does not exceed Budget
constraints.code:
# Constraint: Total spending on soorchle ads does not exceed Budget
model.addConstr(NumSoorchleAds * CostSoorchle <= Budget, name="ad_spending_limit")

constraints.description: Total spending on wassa ads does not exceed Budget
constraints.code:
CostWassa = data["CostWassa"] # scalar parameter
Budget = data["Budget"] # scalar parameter
NumWassaAds = model.addVar(vtype=gp.GRB.INTEGER, name="NumWassaAds")

# Constraint: Total spending on wassa ads does not exceed Budget
model.addConstr(CostWassa * NumWassaAds <= Budget, name="spending_wassa_ads")

constraints.description: Total spending on z-tube, soorchle, and wassa ads does not exceed the budget
constraints.code:
NumZtubeAds = model.addVar(vtype=gp.GRB.INTEGER, name='NumZtubeAds')
NumSoorchleAds = model.addVar(vtype=gp.GRB.INTEGER, name='NumSoorchleAds')
NumWassaAds = model.addVar(vtype=gp.GRB.INTEGER, name='NumWassaAds')

# Example: Add budget constraint
model.addConstr(CostZtube * NumZtubeAds + CostSoorchle * NumSoorchleAds + CostWassa * NumWassaAds <= Budget, 'BudgetConstraint')

# Example: Objective to maximize some function of the ad numbers (needs to be formulated according to the problem context)
model.setObjective(CostZtube * NumZtubeAds + CostSoorchle * NumSoorchleAds + CostWassa * NumWassaAds, gp.GRB.MAXIMIZE)

model.optimize()

constraints.description: The number of advertisements on soorchle should not exceed the maximum number allowed for soorchle.
constraints.code:
# Add constraint for the maximum number of advertisements on soorchle
model.addConstr(NumSoorchleAds <= MaxAdsSoorchle, name="max_ads_soorchle")

constraints.description: The number of wassa ads is at most MaxPropWassa times the total number of ads
constraints.code:
# Add constraint for the maximum proportion of Wassa ads
model.addConstr(NumWassaAds <= MaxPropWassa * (NumZtubeAds + NumSoorchleAds + NumWassaAds), name="max_wassa_ads_prop")

constraints.description: The number of advertisements placed on z-tube should be at least the minimum proportion of the total number of advertisements
constraints.code:
# Add constraint for the minimum proportion of Z-tube advertisements
model.addConstr(NumZtubeAds >= MinPropZtube * (NumZtubeAds + NumSoorchleAds + NumWassaAds), name="min_prop_ztube")

variables.definition: Number of advertisements placed on z-tube
Number of advertisements placed on soorchle
Number of advertisements placed on wassa

objective.description: Maximize the total number of viewers from ads across all platforms
objective.code:
# Define the objective function
objective = ViewersZtube * NumZtubeAds + ViewersSoorchle * NumSoorchleAds + ViewersWassa * NumWassaAds

# Set the objective in the model
model.setObjective(objective, gp.GRB.MAXIMIZE)

prep_code:
import json
import numpy as np
import math

import gurobipy as gp

# Define model

with open("data/nl4opt/prob_16/data.json", "r") as f:
